summary: Tested new Substance Support feature for UK military veterans. All features working correctly: home page card, navigation to /substance-support, all 4 sub-sections (overview, resources, selfhelp, warning), helpline buttons, and back navigation.

integration_issues.issue: data-testid attributes on TouchableOpacity components not rendering in web DOM - must use text-based selectors for Playwright testing
integration_issues.workaround: Use text-based selectors like 'text=Alcohol & Substance Support'

critical_code_review_comments: data-testid attributes may need testID prop (React Native) or explicit dataSet config for web compatibility - currently not blocking functionality
context_for_next_testing_agent: Substance Support feature fully tested. All navigation works: Home -> Substance Support -> Overview/Resources/Self-Help/Warning Signs. Helplines include Combat Stress, AA, Tom Harrison House, Veterans Gateway, Op Courage, and general UK services. Back navigation works via arrow icon in header.

home_page_substance_card.card_visible: PASS - 'Alcohol & Substance Support' card with medkit icon visible
home_page_substance_card.card_styling: PASS - yellow/amber theme matching substance advice context

substance_support_overview.need_to_talk_now: PASS - Combat Stress (0800 138 1619) and AA Helpline (0800 917 7650) quick call buttons
substance_support_overview.why_veterans_at_risk: PASS - 6 risk factors listed with icons
substance_support_overview.navigation_cards: PASS - Helplines & Resources, Self-Help Guide, Warning Signs

substance_support_resources.general_uk_support: PASS - Alcoholics Anonymous UK, Drinkline, FRANK, Change Grow Live, We Are With You, Turning Point
substance_support_resources.phone_numbers_visible: PASS - All phone numbers displayed with green call icon

substance_support_selfhelp.motivation_quote: PASS - Former Royal Marine quote displayed

substance_support_warning_signs.take_action_card: PASS - Green 'Ready to Take Action?' card with Veterans Gateway number
